name: fluen-core
frameworks: logging for error and process logging
Rich - for enhanced console output and progress indicators
Asyncio - for asynchronous execution within command functions
asyncio framework for asynchronous programming in Python
Python standard library features such as abstract base classes and type hints

src/fluen/generator/cross_referencer.py.purpose: The code is designed to resolve cross-references between documentation elements and generate reference graphs.

src/fluen/llm_providers/openai_provider..purpose: The primary purpose of this code is to define an asynchronous provider class, OpenAIProvider, that interacts with the OpenAI API to generate text completions and obtain text embeddings using specified models.

requirements.txt.purpose: This code represents a list of dependencies for a Python project. It specifies the external libraries required for the project, along with their versions.

.fluen/cache/state.json.purpose: Represents metadata or a summary of a project's source code processing status.

src/fluen/generator/templates/default/ht.purpose: The primary purpose of this code is to generate a static HTML documentation page for a software project, which includes project information, a navigation sidebar, and a list of dependencies.

exposures.name: HTML structure with placeholders for project data
Sidebar navigation menu with links to reference files
Project information such as primary language, frameworks, last update, and git commit
Table of project dependencies with version and used-by information
Link to an external JavaScript file

src/fluen/llm_providers/mistral_ai_provi.purpose: The primary purpose of this code is to provide an implementation of the MistralAIProvider class for interacting with the Mistral API, facilitating text generation and embedding retrieval.

src/fluen/llm_providers/ollama_provider..purpose: The code defines an asynchronous provider for interacting with an LLM service via HTTP API, with methods to generate text completions and obtain text embeddings.

src/fluen/llm_factory.py.purpose: This code defines a factory class used to create instances of various LLM provider classes based on a given configuration.

setup.py.purpose: Sets up a Python package named 'fluen', configuring its metadata, dependencies, and entry points.

src/fluen/generator/templates/default/md.purpose: This template is intended to generate documentation for a code file automatically. It outlines the file's purpose, public API, dependencies, and describes each code element like classes and functions.

src/fluen/generator/templates/template_m.purpose: The primary purpose of the code is to manage the template system for documentation generation using the Jinja2 templating engine.

src/fluen/cli.py.purpose: This code is a command-line interface (CLI) tool for generating and exporting code documentation using an LLM-based approach via the Fluen library.

elements.name: FluenContext
elements.purpose: Context object to retain configuration and various states throughout the CLI operations.
elements.documentation: Holds configuration path and data, console object for output, and scan options.

elements.name: pass_fluen_context
elements.purpose: Click decorator to inject FluenContext into command functions.
elements.documentation: Uses click's make_pass_decorator to create a context-pass decorator for commands.

elements.name: cli
elements.purpose: Entry point for the CLI; initializes configuration.
elements.documentation: Defines the main CLI group and handles the loading of configurations when launched with a config path.

elements.name: docs
elements.purpose: Defines a sub-command group under the CLI for documentation-related actions.
elements.documentation: Serves as a placeholder for all commands related to documentation generation and export.

elements.name: generate
elements.purpose: Command to generate code documentation for a codebase.
elements.documentation: Initializes scanning options and triggers the orchestrator to generate documentation. It makes use of async tasks to manage progress display and report success or failure.

elements.name: export
elements.purpose: Command to export generated documentation to a specified format.
elements.documentation: Loads an existing manifest, initializes necessary components, and triggers the export process with progress reporting.

src/fluen/state/manager.py.purpose: Manage the state of a documentation generation process by saving, loading, and updating progress information.

src/fluen/generator/templates/default/md.purpose: The primary purpose of this code is to generate documentation for a project using templating. It provides an overview of the project, lists files by type, outlines dependencies, and gives navigation options.

src/fluen/tests/conftest.py.purpose: This code defines configuration and shared fixtures for PyTest to facilitate testing by setting up temporary environments and sample data structures.

fluen_config.yml.purpose: This configuration file is designed to set up and control the behavior of a code documentation generator called Fluen, particularly by configuring the large language model (LLM) provider, specifying directories for output, cache, and temporary files, and providing project specific-settings.

src/fluen/orchestrator.py.purpose: The primary purpose of this code is to orchestrate the process of generating documentation for a software project. It handles tasks such as cloning or initializing a repository, analyzing the codebase, and generating documentation output.

src/fluen/tests/test_file_analyzer.py.purpose: Tests for the file analysis functionality in a Python project using mock and asynchronous testing.

src/fluen/llm_providers/base_provider.py.purpose: The primary purpose of the code is to define an abstract base class for a language model provider interface, specifying the methods that any derived class must implement.
framework_hints: Python standard library features such as abstract base classes and type hints

src/fluen/generator/manifest.py.purpose: The primary purpose of this code is to generate and manage a documentation manifest for a given project. It tracks file analysis, dependencies, and framework usage across the project.

src/fluen/generator/doc_generator.py.purpose: The primary purpose of this code is to manage the generation of documentation in HTML and Markdown formats based on a given project manifest. It uses templates to render documentation files and organizes them into structured directories.

src/fluen/analyzer/project_analyzer.py.purpose: The code provides functionality for analyzing a software project at a project level. It handles both full project analysis and incremental updates using Git changes, coordinating file level analysis and manifest updating.
framework_hints: asyncio framework for asynchronous programming in Python

src/fluen/git_integration/manager.py.purpose: This module provides functionality for managing and analyzing Git repositories, including connecting to a Git repository, cloning repositories, retrieving the current commit, getting changes since a specific commit, and retrieving file content at a specific commit.

LICENSE.purpose: The primary purpose of this document is to define the conditions under which software may be used, reproduced, and distributed under the Apache License, Version 2.0.

exposures.name: TERMS AND CONDITIONS FOR USE, REPRODUCTION, AND DISTRIBUTION

src/fluen/config.py.purpose: This code defines configurations for a language model application, allowing for these configurations to be loaded from a YAML file or created with default values.

fluen_config.example.yml.purpose: This configuration file is used for setting up and managing settings for a project named 'Fluen', which appears to be a code documentation generator utilizing Large Language Models (LLMs).

src/fluen/generator/templates/default/st.purpose: This code provides styles for a webpage layout that includes a sidebar, content area, and search functionality.

src/fluen/tests/test_git_manager.py.purpose: This code provides test cases for the GitManager functionality, ensuring correct behavior of Git operations.

src/fluen/generator/templates/default/sc.purpose: This code implements a search functionality for documentation, and also highlights the current page in navigation and handles mobile navigation toggling.
